query: Can you please make an audio MeeTime call to my friend at this number 16502531234?

tools.name: CALL_MEETIME
tools.description:
Initiates a MeeTime call to the specified phone number.

This function allows the user to start a Huawei MeeTime call. It can be used
to make either an audio or video call depending on the specified media type.

PHONE_NUMBER.description:
The phone number to call.
- This should be a valid telephone number (e.g., "13800138000").
- The number must be registered with Huawei MeeTime service.

MEDIA_TYPE.description:
The type of call to initiate.
- "AUDIO": Start an audio call. (default)
- "VIDEO": Start a video call.

EXTRA_EVENT_END_TIME.description: The end time of the event in ISO 8601 format. Default is None.

tools.name: CREATE_CALENDER_EVENT
tools.description: Add a new event to the user's calendar.

tools.name: GET_CURRENT_LOCATION
tools.description:
Get the user's current geographic location.

This function retrieves the user's current location information from the device.
The location is returned as a standardized string (e.g., a human-readable address
or a coordinate pair).

returns.description:
The user's current location, which may include:
- A human-readable address, e.g. "21 Lower Kent Ridge Rd, Singapore"
- Or a coordinate string, e.g. "1.2966,103.7764"

tools.name: MAKE_CALL
tools.description:
Open the phone dialer with a specified number pre-filled.

This function opens the system's phone dialer interface and
fills in the given phone number. The user can then manually
confirm and start the call.

PHONE_NUMBER.description:
The phone number to display in the dialer.
- Must be a valid telephone number, e.g. "13800138000" or "+6598765432".
- This function does not automatically place the call.

tools.name: READ_EMAIL
tools.description:
Read emails from the user's mailbox.

Use either a specific MESSAGE_ID or search filters to retrieve one or more emails.

MESSAGE_ID.description: Unique ID of the email to read. If provided, other filters are ignored.

QUERY.description: Free-text search using standard email operators, e.g., from:, subject:, before:, after:, label:.

MAX_RESULTS.description: Maximum number of emails to return. Default: 50.

INCLUDE_BODY.description: Whether to include the full HTML/text body for each email. Default: True.

Use either a specific MESSAGE_ID or search filters to retrieve one or more emails.

MESSAGE_ID.description: Unique ID of the email to read. If provided, other filters are ignored.

QUERY.description: Free-text search using standard email operators, e.g., from:, subject:, before:, after:, label:.

MAX_RESULTS.description: Maximum number of emails to return. Default: 50.

INCLUDE_BODY.description: Whether to include the full HTML/text body for each email. Default: True.

tools.description:
Read emails from the user's mailbox.

Use either a specific MESSAGE_ID or search filters to retrieve one or more emails.

MESSAGE_ID.description: Unique ID of the email to read. If provided, other filters are ignored.

QUERY.description: Free-text search using standard email operators, e.g., from:, subject:, before:, after:, label:.

MAX_RESULTS.description: Maximum number of emails to return. Default: 50.

INCLUDE_BODY.description: Whether to include the full HTML/text body for each email. Default: True.

Use either a specific MESSAGE_ID or search filters to retrieve one or more emails.

MESSAGE_ID.description: Unique ID of the email to read. If provided, other filters are ignored.

QUERY.description: Free-text search using standard email operators, e.g., from:, subject:, before:, after:, label:.

MAX_RESULTS.description: Maximum number of emails to return. Default: 50.

INCLUDE_BODY.description: Whether to include the full HTML/text body for each email. Default: True.

query: Could you fetch all the recent calls from my phone?

tools.name: SEARCH_CALL_RECORD
tools.description:
Retrieve recent call records from the device.

This function queries the device's call history and returns
a list of call records sorted by time (most recent first).
Up to 20 records will be returned.

CALL_RECORD_TYPE.description:
The type of call records to retrieve. Default is 0 (all).
- 0: All calls
- 1: Missed calls
- 2: Received calls
- 3: Outgoing calls

returns.description:
A list of call record dictionaries, each containing
relevant details such as:
{
    "phone_number": "13800138000",
    "call_type": "outgoing",
    "call_duration": 120,  # seconds
    "call_time": "2025-10-07T09:15:00+08:00"
}

tools.description:
Retrieve recent call records from the device.

This function queries the device's call history and returns
a list of call records sorted by time (most recent first).

CALL_RECORD_TYPE.description:

returns.description:

relevant details such as:

    "call_duration": 120,  # seconds
    "call_time": "2025-10-07T09:15:00+08:00"
}

}

tools.name: SEND_EMAIL
tools.description:
Send an email from the user's mailbox.

Creates and sends a new message. Can reply in an existing thread and/or attach files.

BODY_TEXT.description: Plain-text body. Provide at least one of BODY_TEXT or BODY_HTML.

BODY_HTML.description: HTML body. Provide at least one of BODY_TEXT or BODY_HTML.

ATTACHMENTS.description: A list of attachments with {filename, mime_type, content_base64} or {file_id}.

IN_REPLY_TO.description: Message ID this email replies to.

SCHEDULE_TIME.description: Future send time in ISO 8601 UTC. If omitted, sends immediately.

Creates and sends a new message. Can reply in an existing thread and/or attach files.

BODY_TEXT.description: Plain-text body. Provide at least one of BODY_TEXT or BODY_HTML.

BODY_HTML.description: HTML body. Provide at least one of BODY_TEXT or BODY_HTML.

ATTACHMENTS.description: A list of attachments with {filename, mime_type, content_base64} or {file_id}.

IN_REPLY_TO.description: Message ID this email replies to.

SCHEDULE_TIME.description: Future send time in ISO 8601 UTC. If omitted, sends immediately.

query: Please send a motivational email to the sales force at sales@example.com with the subject 'Kickstart the Month!' and the body 'Welcome to a new month full of opportunities! Let's aim to exceed our targets and make it a record-breaking month. Go team!'

arguments.SUBJECT: Kickstart the Month!
arguments.BODY_TEXT: Welcome to a new month full of opportunities! Let's aim to exceed our targets and make it a record-breaking month. Go team!

tools.name: SEND_EMAIL
tools.description:
Send an email from the user's mailbox.

Creates and sends a new message. Can reply in an existing thread and/or attach files.

BODY_TEXT.description: Plain-text body. Provide at least one of BODY_TEXT or BODY_HTML.

BODY_HTML.description: HTML body. Provide at least one of BODY_TEXT or BODY_HTML.

ATTACHMENTS.description: A list of attachments with {filename, mime_type, content_base64} or {file_id}.

IN_REPLY_TO.description: Message ID this email replies to.

SCHEDULE_TIME.description: Future send time in ISO 8601 UTC. If omitted, sends immediately.

query: Can you start the music player?

tools.name: SET_PLAYBACK_STATE
tools.description: Control the playback state of the media player. Users can perform music playback, pause, previous track, next track, and favorite operations.

STATE.description:
The desired playback action to perform.

- "PLAY": Start or resume playback of the current media.
- "PAUSE": Pause the current playback.
- "PLAYPREVIOUS": Play the previous track in the playlist.
- "PLAYNEXT": Play the next track in the playlist.
- "TOGGLEFAVORITE": Add or remove the current track from favorites.

tools.description: Control the playback state of the media player. Users can perform music playback, pause, previous track, next track, and favorite operations.

STATE.description:
The desired playback action to perform.

- "PLAY": Start or resume playback of the current media.
- "PAUSE": Pause the current playback.
- "PLAYPREVIOUS": Play the previous track in the playlist.
- "PLAYNEXT": Play the next track in the playlist.
- "TOGGLEFAVORITE": Add or remove the current track from favorites.

query: Can you initiate a call to 202-555-0173 using the primary SIM card?

tools.name: START_CALL
tools.description:
Directly place a phone call to the specified number.

This function allows the user to directly make a phone call without
opening the dialer interface. It can optionally specify which SIM slot
to use when the device supports dual SIM cards.

PHONE_NUMBER.description:
The phone number to call.
- This should be a valid telephone number, such as "13800138000".
- The function will directly initiate the call.

SLOT_ID.description:
The SIM slot ID to use for the call. Default is 0.
- 0: Primary SIM card (default)
- 1: Secondary SIM card

PHONE_NUMBER.description:

- The function will directly initiate the call.

SLOT_ID.description:
The SIM slot ID to use for the call. Default is 0.
- 0: Primary SIM card (default)
- 1: Secondary SIM card

- "BACK": Use the rear camera. (default)

tools.name: VIEW_CALL_RECORD
tools.description:
Open the call record page in the phone app.

This function navigates to the system's call record interface,
allowing the user to view call history. It supports filtering
by call type (all or missed).

CALL_RECORD_TYPE.description:
The type of call records to display. Default is 0 (all).
- 0: All calls
- 1: Missed calls

Open the call record page in the phone app.

This function navigates to the system's call record interface,
allowing the user to view call history. It supports filtering
by call type (all or missed).

CALL_RECORD_TYPE.description:
The type of call records to display. Default is 0 (all).
- 0: All calls
- 1: Missed calls

This function navigates to the system's call record interface,
allowing the user to view call history. It supports filtering
by call type (all or missed).

CALL_RECORD_TYPE.description:
The type of call records to display. Default is 0 (all).
- 0: All calls
- 1: Missed calls

query: Can you display the best route from Orchard MRT to NUS?

tools.name: VIEW_ROUTES
tools.description: View available routes from ORIGIN to DESTINATION in the default map application.

ORIGIN.description:
The starting point of the route.
- Use "CURRENT" to represent the user's current location.
- Or provide a place name or address string, e.g. "Orchard MRT", "NUS".

DESTINATION.description:
The destination of the route.
- Provide a place name or address string, e.g. "Changi Airport", "Marina Bay Sands".

MODE.description: Optional. The travel mode to use for route calculation. Default is "driving".

DRAFT_ID.description: Existing draft ID. If omitted, a new draft is created.

BODY_TEXT.description: Plain-text body.

BODY_HTML.description: HTML body.

ATTACHMENTS.description: Attachments with content or file ID.

IN_REPLY_TO.description: Message ID this draft would reply to.

query: Could you start drafting an e-mail to 'feedback@retailstore.com' titled 'Product Feedback' providing an honest review about the new product line they launched last month?

arguments.SUBJECT: Product Feedback
arguments.BODY_TEXT: I recently purchased products from your new line launched last month and would like to provide some feedback to help improve future offerings.
